entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
